org.opengis.cite.kml2.c1

Class ModelTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.kml2.CommonFixture
      • org.opengis.cite.kml2.c1.ModelTests

  • public class ModelTests
extends CommonFixture
    Implements tests that apply to kml:Model elements. Outside of an update context the following constraints apply:
    • contains a kml:Link element (specifies the location of a textured 3D object resource)
    • contains a kml:Location element (specifies the position of the model's origin)
    • if the target resource has texture files, contains a kml:ResourceMap element that has a kml:Alias element for each texture file
    The relevant test cases from the abstract test suite are listed below:
    • ATC-129: Valid texture alias
    • ATC-131: Model orientation not empty
    • ATC-133: Model referents
    • ATC-214: Model location
    See Also:
    "OGC 12-007r1: OGC KML 2.3, 10.9.2", "OGC 14-068r1: OGC KML 2.3 - Abstract Test Suite, Conformance Level 1"

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void assertValidAlias(Element alias, URI modelURI)
      Asserts that the given kml:Alias element satisfies all applicable constraints.
      void findModelElements()
      Finds kml:Model elements in the KML document that do not appear in an update context.
      void modelLink()
      [Test] Verifies that a kml:Model element has a valid reference to a textured 3D object resource.
      void modelLocation()
      [Test] Verifies that a kml:Model element has a valid location (that specifies the position of the model origin).
      void orientation()
      [Test] Verifies that a kml:Orientation element contains at least one of the following elements: kml:heading, kml:tilt, or kml:roll.
      void resourceMap()
      [Test] Verifies that the kml:Alias elements appearing in a kml:ResourceMap element satisfy all of the following constraints: the value of the child kml:targetHref element is a URI reference to an image (texture) resource; the value of the child kml:sourceHref element corresponds to a file reference that appears within the 3D object resource referenced by the sibling kml:Link element Note: The source file is expected to be a textual (including XML) digital asset resource such as a COLLADA file.

    • Constructor Detail

        public ModelTests()

    • Method Detail

      • findModelElements

        public void findModelElements()
        Finds kml:Model elements in the KML document that do not appear in an update context. If none are found, all test methods defined in the class are skipped.

      • modelLocation

        public void modelLocation()
        [Test] Verifies that a kml:Model element has a valid location (that specifies the position of the model origin).

      • modelLink

        public void modelLink()
        [Test] Verifies that a kml:Model element has a valid reference to a textured 3D object resource. The referent must exist, but the content is not prescribed by the KML specification. In practice this is usually a COLLADA file (model/vnd.collada+xml);

      • orientation

        public void orientation()
        [Test] Verifies that a kml:Orientation element contains at least one of the following elements: kml:heading, kml:tilt, or kml:roll.

      • resourceMap

        public void resourceMap()
        [Test] Verifies that the kml:Alias elements appearing in a kml:ResourceMap element satisfy all of the following constraints:
        1. the value of the child kml:targetHref element is a URI reference to an image (texture) resource;
        2. the value of the child kml:sourceHref element corresponds to a file reference that appears within the 3D object resource referenced by the sibling kml:Link element
        Note: The source file is expected to be a textual (including XML) digital asset resource such as a COLLADA file.

      • assertValidAlias

        void assertValidAlias(Element alias,
                    URI modelURI)
        Asserts that the given kml:Alias element satisfies all applicable constraints.
        Parameters:
        alias - A kml:Alias element.
        modelURI - An absolute URI that refers to a 3D model (e.g. a COLLADA file); this will be used to resolve relative source URIs if necessary.
